title: Smart Canteen Queue
text: Camera estimates queue length; app suggests best time.
summary: Computer vision estimates cafeteria queue; users plan lunch.

title: EcoBin IoT
text: IoT bins ping when full; sanitation routes optimized.
summary: Sensors in bins optimize pickup routes, cut fuel.

title: StudyBuddy
summary: Match students by course/time and study goals.

title: HealthTrack
text: Steps + mood + water intake → wellness score.
summary: Daily habits scored; nudges to improve health.

title: Campus Shuttle ETA
text: GPS buses + ETA in app; low‑battery mode UI.
summary: Live bus ETAs with energy‑lite UI for old phones.
